explanation: The stage direction describes characters moving from one side of the stage to the other. Specifically, one character 'sortant du pavillon de gauche’ (leaving from the left pavilion) and moving 'se dirigeant vers la droite' (heading to the right), while another character 'Courtès va du côte contraire' (Courtès goes in the opposite direction). This indicates movement across the stage without specifying an entrance or exit.
stgdir: Sortant du pavillon de gauche, et se dirigeant vers la droite, tandis que Courtès va du côte contraire.
